features: DUAL MAGNIFICATION: Double sided flip-and-view mirror Includes 1X standard view and 5X zoom magnifying view
STURDY BASE: This tabletop mirror swivels easily on a solid round base that stays in place, perfect for views of every angle
DESK OR TABLETOP MIRROR: This small mirror provides the reflections you need without cluttering your space
NEUTRAL DESIGN: Clear mirror frame and base complement any decor or style
GET READY WITH EASE: Perfect for applying makeup, brushing hair, tweezing, and more
body.description: The Basik Edition™, elevated styling for everyday style. The Flip and View Mirror is an essential addition to your makeup table or bathroom countertop. Always ready for quick touch-ups or full face and hair styling, the mirror has dual magnification — 1x standard and 5x close-up. The mirror face moves easily on a round swivel for a custom view while the base keeps it firmly in place on your dresser, desk, or wherever you get ready for your day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mag mirror is excellent, but it's too small to be used efficiently. If you need it plucking eyebrows and you have normal eyesight, then it will probably be good for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The 5x side is very clear. This is an excellent mirror.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very difficult to use
reviews.reviewText: - The suction cups would not work, the mirror fell down from the mirror repeatedly.- The area of magnification on the mirror is so small that it was hard to get the area I wanted to focus on within the magnification area.- The on/off is incredibly sensitive.Overall I would not recommend this product. There are probably better options out there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Suction cups don’t stick very well
reviews.reviewText: Light is great but turning off & on you have to push button hard

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good mirror and light but tricky to open
reviews.reviewText: I really like that this compact mirror is rechargable and easy to travel. It feels durable in the hand and not dinky. The mirrors are clear and not distorted. The light is just bright enough without a heavy glare like some similar products. The only thing I don't like is that it closes very securely and it's a bit tricky to open.There are three tiny raised dots on the front edge of the lid. You are supposed to be able to grab and lift the lid with this. However, my fingers just slide right over it. I have to insert a fingernail under the lid to grab it and pop it up. That would make it difficult if someone keeps their nails trimmed down or if they have an expensive manicure they don't want to chip. I would love to see an improvement on this.Overall, this is a very good mirror other than the issue above. Great quality and it's attractive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars The suction cup doesn't work at all!
reviews.reviewText: The magnifying glass and the light is great however the suction cup doesn't work at all. Terrible.The previous version with only one bigger suction cup was perfect. Will return

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS MIRROR!!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is the best!! You can see every flaw, lol!! I use it to see every eyebrow hair that needs to be plucked because I don't wax. I had once received this mirror for a product review but it came up missing so I found it on here and had to buy it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good construction. Exactly as shown. Good reputable brand name.
reviews.reviewText: There is some comfort in purchasing a product from a familiar, known name brand with a good reputation. Conair is one of those brand names. The compact mirror with lighting feature is exactly as described and shown in the product details.It is competently designed, with quality materials and manufacture. The product feels like a solidly crafted product. Some compact mirrors have dimmable lights, or levels of brightness. This has one setting, which is fine. It provides ample illumination. Perhaps more importantly, it's a ring around the 1X mirror and affords an even lighting. Instead of different lighting intensity or dimming function, it just provides a quality lighting instance.A full charged battery will provide up to 3 hours of operating time, which is a generous capacity. To achieve this amount of lighting time, requires a large capacity battery. This would account for the thickness of the compact. Although, to be fair, the compact dimensions are in line with other comparable products.The small power button is located near the rear of the compact. Personally, I found this to be an odd position. I thought it would have been wiser to have it at the front of the compact. The button is rather small. Maybe having it close to the charging port makes it easier to find.The color is a darker blue than the illustrations in the product details. The significant other thought that there should be at least a pink option. Red would also be a worthwhile option. After all, a compact is marketed to women. I think she makes a valid point.Attached are photos to show real world images of the compact, with a ruler to show size reference. I included a close up of the back of the compact, showing the location of the charging port and small power button.Overall, it's a well crafted compact. The LED lighting is nicely implemented. Based on initial impressions, this compact reflects well upon the Conair reputation. It earns a 4.5 star rating, with a high level recommendation.

This is one of those things that I never thought about, until I randomly wished one day that I could find a brightly lit hand held mirror. I found lots of options on Amazon, but opted for this one because I trust the Conair name, and it's rechargeable. The light is nice and bright, and seems to last for ages without recharging (I haven't had to recharge it since buying it). It seems pricey at first glance, but performs better than I expected, and I've recommended it to others.
On ne voit pas bien - il faut être très près et encore. J'ai retourné l'article.

reviews.reviewTitle: No se podía pegar al espejo porque se abria
reviews.reviewText: El espejo y la luz muy bien pero la parte de atrás donde están las baterías no cerraba bien y no lo podías pegar al espejo del tocador para depilarte porque se caía

The very first time I took it camping I couldn’t use it :/ the button to turn it on has broken. Now it’s just a big mirror with no light and I still need to use my headlamp to put on make up (challenging to do which is why I bought a mirror with a light) :/
